Articles.Content:
Crossbow Dynamics presents. Our first experimental aircraft CBX-1.

Not sure about the potential purpose of the plane. It's certainly not a fighter as it lacks maneuverability, but it's quite stable and relatively easy to control. And it has a good range. So I guess it should be tactical bomber or recon unit.

.craft file - http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1012825/Skywhip.craft
